meanings.definition: Of or relating to a planisphere.
meanings.sent1: The planispheric design of the globe made it easy to study the stars.
meanings.sent2: The planispheric map was perfect for learning about constellations.
meanings.sent3: The planispheric chart was so detailed, it almost looked like a treasure map!
meanings.sent4: Her planispheric necklace reflected the night sky in a beautiful way.
meanings.sent5: The planispheric model of the solar system was both educational and fascinating.

meanings.definition: A type of map projection that shows the entire Earth's surface on a single plane.
meanings.sent1: The planispheric map helped us understand the world's geography better.
meanings.sent2: Studying the planispheric projection made it easier to visualize the Earth's features.
meanings.sent3: The planispheric map was so flat, it looked like a giant pancake!
meanings.sent4: Using the planispheric model, we could see the world in a whole new light.
meanings.sent5: The planispheric representation of Earth was both informative and eye-opening.
